comment: Super guy!
the guy knows his stuff and always help you do your best if you put some effort first. his goal is not to fail you but to make you understand the material. easy grader...

Dr. Gissy is a good professor. He tries to be tough on the class at first and weed out the slackers. When it comes down to it he's a good guy though. You must be able to understand the homework or you will not do well on his tests.Class attendance is highly recommended.
I found him to be a really good proffessor. I would recommend him to anyone. He is very clear and lets you use formula sheet...

I recommend this guy highly!! Exams were essay (choose 5 out of 8 questions) basically straight from the book. This included the final which was take home! 2 reports are required tho they were easy to complete in an hour. Class isn't all that exciting but he is not a bad teacher if you are required to take the course. Recommended!

The class itself is VERY HARD!! Even though classes are not mandatory, I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND going to class!! He doesn't teach right off the book but it makes more sense the way he does it!! YOU MUST STUDY HARD!!! I did various exercise problems before the test and did fine! I'd definitely take him again!! VERY SMART PROFESSOR!

Fantastic teacher.  I am not a fan of college but I really enjoyed this guy.  Doing the homework is key to understand the material.  He goes over the problems as much as needed and is great with answering questions.  Awesome sense of humor as well!

I was actually let down by Professor Gissy. Most of his ratings were fairly good but I did not enjoy his class or his teaching at all. He would pace back and forth in front of the board and click the top of the dry erase marker and not say anything... drove me insane. The class is difficult to begin with and I would highly recommend going to class!

Dr. Gissy was one of the best professors I have ever had.  He is an extremely colorful guy.  Not boring at all.  Even though his tests are hard and you really have to think, though he dosent grade to harshley.  He grades on what he thinks you know.

This man is quote possibly the worst teacher I have ever had... EVER. He does not teach any of the material, I was forced to teach myself and my forte is NOT in Economics. I did not understand or follow any of his lectures... if you can even call them lectures. DO NOT TAKE HIM. HORRIBLE PROFESSOR.
Did not explain the material very well at all. I was confused the whole semester, but I worked my butt off and got an A.
This is not an easy class but Mr Gissy made things very easy to understand.His tests are not that hard.Make sure you do the homework and practice or you wont be able to do good in this class.
Professor Gissy is a really nice man, but I did not think that he was a good teacher. He did not explain stuff well to me. I worked hard and ended up with an A.
I guess this is a testiment on how good a teacher he is... I was confused from start to finish. Did the homework and went over my notes. Got an A. I would recommend him if he returns for Fall/Spring!

I would take this teacher again if he was still at the school. I thought I was so confused all semester, I never thought I was doing anything right, but I always was, if that makes sense. It doesn't seem like you're getting it, but he's a great teacher and you end up with an A

this guy is prob the best teacher of econ 2300 in the whole of kennesaw state university i took this course before with baker and was confused as hell with him he gave us more material but was clear and showed us how to apply it in real life i think he should be made a full time teacher pls mr president dont let this one go you will be a bigBIG foo

He is the best teacher anyone can have. He repeats the problem until you fully understand. he is funny and wants all students to do well in his class. I thought statistics was hard, but with him as long as you go to class and pay attention you will do well. He is a great teacher I would recommend him anytime any where.
definitely recommend taking gissy. hes very nice, helpful, funny. his class is easy if you go and learn the material. homework is easy and will help you alot on the tests and on your final grade.

Go to class and ask questions if you don't understand and this class will not be hard. You get a formula sheet to use on the tests. If you do the 4 homeworks and report you have a real boost in your possible grade.
He is a great professor. He explains everything clearly and he gives you a great study guide right before the test. I would highly recommend this professor.

This professor rocks. Very understanding, nice guy. Works with you on the isssues, very lenient on grading. Has 3 tests and a final, gives you a nice study guide and pretty much tells you whats going to be in the test in the test review class before the test. HIGHLY recommended.
I was going to drop at first, but I'm glad I didn't.  His tests are only about 5 questions, so do well on them.  They aren't too hard though.  You also have article write ups you have to do.
thinks that he is funny and is cynical but overall is a good professor.
No Comments

very tough class, but this professor helped me to learn it very quickly. His tests are a lot of math, and essays. I loved this class. If you want to learn economics, this is the prof to take. He also teaches at GSU during the week. He is pretty funny, and makes economics interesting.

Awsome professor! Very smart and a great sense of humor.  If he jokingly picks on you (nothing cruel) then he likes you.  I took the Saturday morning section of this class from 8 to 10:45 and for once I didn't mind getting up early on a Saturday!  I would recommend taking him any day!
Great Teacher...very knowledgeable!
He is funny, very smart, knows what he is talking about.  He gets off the topic a lot, but explains your questions very well.  4 test, all from notes. Teaches off the top of his head.
He is a great teacher and he is funny. I have an A in the class but i worked for it. No need to buy the book. Take good notes and ask questions.
